t: For the director of music. A maskil of David. When Doeg the Edomite had gone to Saul and told him: “David has gone to the house of Ahimelek.”
Why*pn do you boast of evil, you mighty hero? Why*ld do you boast all day long, you*ld who are a disgrace in the eyes of God?
You*ln who practice deceit, your*ld tongue plots destruction; it*ld is like a sharpened razor.
You*ln love evil rather than good, falsehood*ld rather than speaking the truth.
You*ln love every harmful word, you*ld deceitful tongue!
Surely*pn God will bring you down to everlasting ruin: He*ld will snatch you up and pluck you from your tent; he*ld will uproot you from the land of the living.
The*ln righteous will see and fear; they*ld will laugh at you, saying,
“Here*ln now is the man who*ld did not make God his stronghold but*ln trusted in his great wealth and*ld grew strong by destroying others!”
But*pn I am like an olive tree flourishing*ld in the house of God; I*ln trust in God’s unfailing love for*ld ever and ever.
For*ln what you have done I will always praise you in*ld the presence of your faithful people. And*ln I will hope in your name, for*ld your name is good.
